nodes.text: The KL-2B Battle Droid was a model of three-legged battle droid used by the Hutt Cartel on the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. A number of KL-2B units were among the dozens of droids that malfunctioned in the Network Security District and went on a rampage.
Malfunctioning Hutt KL-2B Battle Droids appears as enemies on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
